column1: 5435,Marvel Adventures the Avengers (2006) #7,7,7642,215,"Treasure hunter Cain Marko steals a cursed ruby and gets more than he bargained for when he is magically transformed into the indestructible Juggernaut!  The mighty Avengers rush to help earthquake victims, only to be confronted by this powerful new foe.  Now it's up to Storm and Wolverine to save countless innocents from a man who cannot be beaten and cannot be stopped!,2006,11
